name: Caroline's Important Life Diary
description:
The penultimate Xbox Live Indie Games classic finally goes multiplatform on the 10th of February 2023. Now, in what other game can you immerse yourself in school life in a more spectacular or C.O.O.L. manner than this? Surely this is the perfect time to experience the magic of Caroline's Important Life!

  • For Android & Windows (98SE to 11)
  • Make choices to experience one of ten possible branching paths
  • Be a C.O.O.L. girl!

“The best experience of my life... or of anyone's life really”

— Max Loring-Hale
